name: Memory Key
description:
Use arrows to play the game !!!

You forget… To dont forget…

Funny puzzle game.

Help an old man to go back to his memories.

Remember me!

"So, are you the one who gonna help me to search into my memory after the key of my souvenirs???

I'm an old man and I live in a retirement home.

I just want to go back into different period of my past an remeber good old times an feel young again."

Alex, Dimi, Gillian, Kevin...
